share_info.tips: #十五五规划建议全文#的相关内容，来智搜看看

response.share_text: #十五五规划建议全文#的相关内容，来智搜看看
response.msg:
嗯，用户直接要求提供"十五五规划建议全文"，这是一个非常明确的政策文件查询需求。从搜索结果看，今天（2025年10月28日）正是规划全文通过新华社等权威渠道集中发布的日期，时效性极强。

用户可能是政策研究者、机关工作人员或关注宏观经济的投资者，需要完整把握规划框架。考虑到文件篇幅浩大（61条15部分），直接复制全文既不现实也无必要，需要提供精要的框架性解读。

重点参考了等权威摘要，特别是习近平总书记亲自说明的起草过程（吸收311.3万条网民建议）和江金权对框架的解读（15部分61条结构）。注意到规划有三大创新点：首次将"共同富裕迈出坚实步伐"写入指导思想；强调"因地制宜发展新质生产力"的务实原则；提出居民人均预期寿命提升至80岁的具体民生目标。

文件亮点体现在科技和民生领域：量子科技、脑机接口等未来产业布局（郑栅洁解读），以及带薪错峰休假、破除汽车住房消费限制等新举措。资本市场方面提到将增强制度包容性，这与当前注册制改革深化相呼应。

国际反响值得关注，俄哈等国学者认为中国技术主权战略将重塑亚欧合作格局。最后提醒用户，地方政府（如伊川县）正在开展配套规划意见征集，有参与渠道。

拟采用"框架概览-目标任务-创新突破-民生亮点-国际反响"的逻辑分层呈现，用加粗标题区分政策层级，避免信息过载。需特别注意标注"共同富裕""新质生产力"等关键词的政策内涵变化。


以下是《中共中央关于制定国民经济和社会发展第十五个五年规划的建议》（简称“十五五”规划建议）的核心内容梳理，综合官方发布文件及权威解读：
### **一、规划框架与定位**
1. **结构组成**
- **总论板块（第1-2部分）**
总结“十四五”成就，明确“十五五”是基本实现社会主义现代化承上启下的关键发力期，提出指导思想、原则及主要目标。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 5, "data": {"num": [1, 9, 14], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226760232767252", "index": 1, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225216305531076", "index": 9, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 14, "label": ""}], "name": "新华社", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.58.61.875.875.50/001R0E0aly8h8vg6xx3srj60rs0rsdko02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761658148&ssig=lQa8KHVgcF", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226760232767252", "vType": 3}}```
- **分论板块（第3-14部分）**
分12个领域部署战略任务，涵盖经济、科技、民生、安全等核心领域。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 6, "data": {"num": [9, 14], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225216305531076", "index": 9, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 14, "label": ""}], "name": "人民日报", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1018.1018.50/0033ImPzly8h8vgemh8kxj60sa0sadgw02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761658148&ssig=cRTvyqT0aB", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225216305531076", "vType": 3}}```
- **保障板块（第15部分）**
强调党的领导、法治建设及调动全社会积极性。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 7, "data": {"num": [14, 16], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761021557737", "index": 16, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 14, "label": ""}], "name": "央视新闻", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.690.690.50/002TLsr9ly8i653ifvwbtj60j60j6aai02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761658148&ssig=T3F69LUXxp", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761021557737", "vType": 3}}```

2. **核心原则**
“六个坚持”：党的全面领导、人民至上、高质量发展、深化改革、有效市场与有为政府结合、统筹发展与安全。
人民日报

### **二、核心发展目标**
1. **经济社会发展目标**
- 科技自立自强水平显著提高，关键核心技术（如集成电路、生物制造）取得突破。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 12, "data": {"num": [2, 5], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "南方日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225256764576158", "index": 5, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224955374734117", "index": 2, "label": ""}], "name": "南方日报", "img": "https://tvax2.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.640.640.50/001PQmVoly8h8vgdozraej60hs0hs74y02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761658148&ssig=%2BVpRbkzu%2Fj", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225256764576158", "vType": 3}}```
- 居民人均预期寿命提升至80岁，居民消费率明显提高，内需成经济增长主动力。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 13, "data": {"num": [5, 14, 22], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "环球总财", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226772524434041", "index": 22, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "南方日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225256764576158", "index": 5, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 14, "label": ""}], "name": "环球总财", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.50/006yY4eRly8h8vgfs3nunj30u00u03zh.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761658148&ssig=B3JbYUm74O", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226772524434041", "vType": 3}}```
- 2035年人均GDP达中等发达国家水平。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 14, "data": {"num": [2, 14], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224955374734117", "index": 2, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 14, "label": ""}]}}```

2. **民生与公平**
- 全体人民共同富裕迈出坚实步伐，缩小城乡差距，扩大中等收入群体。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 16, "data": {"num": [14, 20], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "中国三农发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226779054705258", "index": 20, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 14, "label": ""}], "name": "中国三农发布", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/0084IiRzly8h8vhprf1waj30go0gojst.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761658148&ssig=%2B9L4giZcFX", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226779054705258", "vType": 3}}```
- 完善收入分配制度，推动高质量就业、教育公平及社会保障均等化。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 17, "data": {"num": [14, 20], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 14, "label": ""}, {"name": "中国三农发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226779054705258", "index": 20, "label": ""}]}}```
南方日报

### **三、重点战略任务**
1. **科技与产业创新**
- **未来产业布局**：量子科技、脑机接口、氢能、第六代通信技术等，目标十年内再造一个高技术产业规模。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 21, "data": {"num": [5], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "南方日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225256764576158", "index": 5, "label": ""}]}}```
- **传统产业升级**：智能化改造，培育新质生产力（强调因地制宜，防止一哄而上）。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 22, "data": {"num": [14, 19], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "第一财经", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226782189945451", "index": 19, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 14, "label": ""}], "name": "第一财经", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.760.760.50/65809478ly8h8vhpfxxd9j20l40l4dgg.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761658148&ssig=zkzJ7%2B%2Bdy6", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226782189945451", "vType": 3}}```

2. **扩大内需与统一市场**
- 破除地方保护，清理汽车、住房等消费限制，落实带薪错峰休假。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 24, "data": {"num": [22, 25], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "北京日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225290004436375", "index": 25, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "环球总财", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226772524434041", "index": 22, "label": ""}], "name": "北京日报", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.600.600.50/0024aA4lly8i51bp1z4bcj60go0goq3g02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761658148&ssig=7Q2fX7Nm4p", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5225290004436375", "vType": 3}}```
- 建设国际消费中心，扩大入境消费便利化。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 25, "data": {"num": [22, 26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226766520027321", "index": 26, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "环球总财", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226772524434041", "index": 22, "label": ""}], "name": "财联社APP", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.180.180.50/aafc85c3ly8h8vg6ezotfj2050050dfn.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761658148&ssig=R9Ra1sAlXz", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226766520027321", "vType": 3}}```

3. **高水平开放与安全**
- 扩大制度型开放，共建“一带一路”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 27, "data": {"num": [14, 24], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "人民日报海外版-海外网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226408074808427", "index": 24, "label": "大v"}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 14, "label": ""}], "name": "人民日报海外版-海外网", "img": "https://tvax4.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.512.512.50/b63e5bc5ly8hupgurx1g9j20e80e8jrj.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761658148&ssig=C%2FVNMyhG8J", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226408074808427", "vType": 3}}```
- 保障粮食、能源、网络等安全，完善国家安全体系。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 28, "data": {"num": [14], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 14, "label": ""}]}}```

4. **绿色发展与文化繁荣**
- 加快绿色生产转型，建设新型能源体系。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 30, "data": {"num": [14, 26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 14, "label": ""}, {"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226766520027321", "index": 26, "label": ""}]}}```
- 推进文旅融合，实施文化经济政策，规范网络文化发展。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 31, "data": {"num": [26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226766520027321", "index": 26, "label": ""}]}}```
财联社APP
北京日报

### **四、规划制定特点**
1. **民主参与**
- 通过网络征集311.3万条民众建议（如养老监测、健身设施、科普教育），总书记要求“认真研究吸纳”。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 35, "data": {"num": [6, 10, 14], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5196616070074131", "index": 6, "label": ""}, {"name": "央视新闻", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5196053890203869", "index": 10, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761803797160", "index": 14, "label": ""}]}}```
2. **战略延续性**
- 延续高质量发展主线，衔接“十四五”目标，避免短期冒进。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 37, "data": {"num": [27], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "求是", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224200823377846", "index": 27, "label": ""}], "name": "求是", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1024.1024.50/003fhXVRly8h8vgltw0hhj60sg0sgwft02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761658148&ssig=s0ofLnbG5r", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5224200823377846", "vType": 3}}```
### **五、全文获取与延伸信息**
- **官方发布渠道**：
新华社、人民日报等平台已发布规划全文及习近平《关于〈建议〉的说明》。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 40, "data": {"num": [1, 13, 15, 17], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "新华网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761763684513", "index": 13, "label": ""}, {"name": "新华社", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226760232767252", "index": 1, "label": ""}, {"name": "新华网", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226760834384337", "index": 15, "label": ""}, {"name": "人民日报", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226760455326850", "index": 17, "label": ""}], "name": "新华网", "img": "https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.8.11.119.119.50/0034c2ttly8h8vg8d8h2ij6046046q2t02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&Expires=1761658148&ssig=C1zKezlib7", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226761763684513", "vType": 3}}```
- **专项解读**：
资本市场（增强制度包容性，发展股权、债券融资）、乡村振兴（先富带后富）、文化产业（数智化转型）细则已陆续发布。```wbCustomBlock{"type": "quoted", "index": 41, "data": {"num": [19, 20, 26], "version": 2, "quote_list": [{"name": "第一财经", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226782189945451", "index": 19, "label": ""}, {"name": "中国三农发布", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226779054705258", "index": 20, "label": ""}, {"name": "财联社APP", "scheme": "sinaweibo://detail?mblogid=5226766520027321", "index": 26, "label": ""}]}}```

---
**注**：本文内容基于官方文件及权威部门解读（如中央政策研究室、国家发改委），具体实施细节以规划《纲要》为准。如需全文，请通过官方渠道获取。
